ðŸ“– Summary: The py-mcp-manager repository provides a desktop application for managing MCP servers. It simplifies the process of configuring, starting, stopping, and monitoring multiple MCP servers from a single graphical interface. The application allows users to manage server configurations, monitor logs, and control server status in real-time.
